entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
